their fuel content, and a note is also included allowing the inclusion of Municipal Solid Waste

Answer
Incineration is to be treated as a recovery operation if it meets the conditions to be considered as
an ‘R1 Use principally as fuel or other means to generate energy’ operation, according to Annex
